edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.aflat

Class AFlatLinguist.GrammarState

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.aflat.AFlatLinguist.GrammarState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchState, SearchStateArc
    Enclosing class:
    AFlatLinguist

    public class AFlatLinguist.GrammarState
extends Object
    Represents a grammar node in the search graph. A grammar state needs to keep track of the associated grammar node as well as the left context and next base unit.
